title: How to Prepare Semolina (Sooji) Halwa

steps.headline: Take a pan and heat the pan on a medium flame.
When the pan is hot add butter to it.
Take the cashews and raisins and fry them in the butter.
Fry the semolina(sooji) in the butter till it gets golden brown.
Take a pan and boil the water.
Add the sugar to the boiling water.
Take the fried semolina(sooji) add slowly into the boiling water stir properly otherwise lumps will be formed.
stir the semolina(sooji) till all the water evaporates.
Add some more butter to it.
Finally add cashews, raisins and cardamom powder to it and mix well.
Turn off the heat and allow the mixture to cool down.
Semolina(sooji) halwa is ready to eat.
